name: WP Custom Voting
author: Binish Prabhakar and Vivek Pillai

sections.description:
This plugin is meant for admin to bring the feature of VOTING to their posts or pages. Admin can set the button label before and after voting both for pages and posts. All votes are IP tracked, so same user can’t vote twice for the same post or page buttons.

The admin can choose the postion of the votting buttons on top , bottom or both of the page or post. The site visitor can also view the total votes along with the button same as in facebook.

WP Custom Voting Plugin allows you to:

  • Write your own text

  • Choose font color

  • Choose button position

Please visit http://www.dmitritech.com to download the plugin.
sections.installation:
See the Screenshots for detailed Installation.
1. Upload the files to the /wp-content/plugins/wp-custom-voting/ directory.
2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
3. Go to WP Custom Vote menu in WordPress.
See the Screenshots for for more details.

Please allow up to 48 for a reply. Thanks!

upgrade_notice: The current version of WP Custom Voting requires WordPress 3.2 or higher. If you use older version of WordPress, you need to upgrade WordPress first.
